DOC.brief_title: Optimizing Assessment Refractive Outcomes After Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects implant ACRYSOF® IQ Monofocal IOL Model SN60WF . Standard clinical practice follow pre-operative testing , IOL power estimation IOL implantation . Only one eye enrol study per surgeon determination . The eye undergo automate manual manifest refraction assessment 3 month postoperative .
